DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy SB injection Non Small Cell Lung Cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Safety Efficacy SB Injection Patients With Advanced Metastatic Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: All eligible patient receive SB injection therapy 4 cycle ( 14~21 day cycle ) . SB injection treatment could continue completion therapy cycle 6th cycle . It depend investigator 's decision patient 's . Efficacy evaluate every two cycle .
DOC.criteria: Age 1870 year Patients histologically cytologically confirm NonSmall Cell Lung Cancer Patients fail 1 cycle standard therapy advance metasatic stage available resectable surgery radiotherapy . Patients measurable lesion Eatern Cooperative Oncolgy Group status 0 2 . Life expectancy > /= 5 month Patients adequate organ ( heart , kidney , liver ) bone marrow function , define 1 . Absolute neutrophil count > /= 1.5 x 10^9/L , Platelet count > /= 100 x 10^9/L 2 . Total bilirubin < /= upper limit normal 3 . Aspartate Aminotransferase and/or Alanine Aminotransferase < /= 2 x upeer limit normal 4. creatinine < /= 1.5 x upeer limit normal Patients sign informed consent form . Female volunteer admit study must use reliable mean contraception Received radiation therapy within 6 week randomization Known brain spinal cord metastasis Have acute infection Have active infection serious concomitant systemic disorder incompatible study Presence history malignancy NonSmall Cell Lung Cancer Have severe neurologic psychological disorder Patients receive chemoradiotherapy immunotherapy Patients receive chemotherapy within previous 30 day Patients candidate combine modality treatment . Patients participate clinical study within previous 30 day
